attributes.action: Close the Israeli embassy in London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the devastating assault on Gaza, the state of Israel should be treated like the pariah state that it is and the Israeli embassy should be closed down in Kensington, London and the Ambassador should be expelled.
This is exactly what the governments of Venezuela and Bolivia have done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
